altername_name: SOTE - Der Schatten des Bösen (Harcons Fluch)
name: SOTE: Shadow of the Evil
overview: Originally a fan work but picked up and published commercially in 64'er 1993/12 with very good sound, good graphics and 1351 mouse support. Mapping recommended for the deep dungeons. A role-playing game where the player selects adventurers and descend into the depths of the dungeon. The gameplay is reminiscent of the 3D dungeon crawl type of role-playing games popularized by Dungeon Master, Wizardry and The Bard's Tale.
